pages.text: This block will receive a redstone signal from a linked redstone transmitter. To link this receiver with a transmitter right-select the transmitter (or another linked receiver) with this block. Enabling 'analog mode' causes the power level of transmitted signals to be preserved at the receiving end
Use a $(l:rftoolsutility:logic/redstone_transmitter)Redstone Transmitter$(/l) or a Button Module in a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/screen)Screen$(/l) to send redstone signals
